example.text: Dr. Jonas vaccinated Laurie against chicken pox.

example.name: Two examples in one sentence (you would only tag for the one highlighted as the 'rel')
example.text: The researchers aimed to determine the relationship between parents' self-vaccination and their vaccination of their young children.
